entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `TimeSpan.ToString("c")` alternative that doesn't render days #88062
    Future
  • Implement generational aware analysis GC events #88059
    8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Wasm.Browser.Threads.Minimal sample is failing #88057
    8.0.0
  • Enable Finalizer event in NativeAOT #88056
    8.0.0
  • VTable setup of type WasmLibrary.TestClass failed #88054
  • [mono][ios] Unknown format in import in System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #88050
    8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] System.Formats.Tar.Tests are failing with System.ArgumentException #88049
    8.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] : More accurate error messages when failing to map fields or parameters #88048
    Future
  • Blazor Wasm debugging with a proxy #88051
  • X509Certificate2 class unable to read Subject data from some certificates on WSL/Docker containers/Linux #88037
  • Full GC starts every 24 hours after system starting #88035
  • [API Proposal]: ability to have stable hash codes #88031
  • Static field in value type with empty generic causes `TypeLoadException` #88030
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/opt/cse/HugeField2/HugeField2.cmd #88028
    8.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #88027
    8.0.0

Closed

  • if using System.Numerics.Vector.IsHardwareAccelerated return false but the code into if statement #87537
  • Trying to get DOTNET_gcServer to work #88065
  • Wrong computed RID on Alpine Linux alpha / beta releases #73525
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8: Simplify RID Model #71285
    8.0.0
  • Define RIDs for CBL-Mariner #65566
    8.0.0
  • Shared framework is missing correct RID fallback chain for manjaro #62554
    8.0.0
  • AssemblyLoadContext Unload does not release PDB file #66091
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator outerloop test failure #87999
  • Linker CI build failure: Arcade SDK cannot be found in OSX x64 #76680
  • Enable NativeAOT cross-platform build for iOS-like platforms #87764
    8.0.0
  • `runtime-staging` pipeline running on PRs #87958
  • Outerloop crossgen 2 failures: The file is not a ReadyToRun image #87299
  • System.Diagnostics.Process with CreateNoWindow does not redirect stdout/stderr to parent process #68259
    Future
  • LibraryImportGenerator does not respect C# 11 `scoped` modifier on parameters #77624
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT produces static library that makes ld crash #88032
  • [API Proposal]: Additional ToFrozenDictionary overloads with optimizeForReading #87633
    8.0.0
  • [HttpStress] massive cancellation errors in HTTP/3 #87957
    8.0.0
  • jit-diff produces random diffs on Linux due to relocs #87842
    Future
  • Custom ILLinker substitutions for feature switches don't seem to work on .NET 8 #88015
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make `System.IO.Pipelines.Pipe.Length` from `internal` to `public` #87808
  • HttpClient throws InvalidOperationException for two very different reasons #39758
    Future
  • Resolve workaround for linker 1541 main assembly rooting behavior in AOT compiler #78752
    8.0.0
  • ILCompiler --make-repro-path improvements #79032
    8.0.0
  • [mono]stackoverflow crash use jit-interp mixed mode #87200

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert Volatile to JIT intrinsics #88073
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • TryFindSystemTimeZoneById #88071
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2209838 #88069
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Optimize Vector128<float>/<double>.Equals in interp/jiterp #88064
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Discard lastIndexMarshalled variable if it is not otherwise used #88060
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Automatically instrument jiterpreter traces if td->verbose_level > 0 #88053
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix dupe word typos. #88047
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • TcpListener should implement IDisposable #88043
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [OSX] When HybridGlobalization mode is on load hybrid icu file #88041
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Workaround for __clear_cache() #88039
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Use compGetTieringName for disassembly output #88033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] The REG_SCRATCH is not conflict with REG_PINVOKE_FRAME. #88029
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add newguid.bat/sh to update jiteeversionguid.h #88022
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview6] Bump downlevel version to 7.0.9 #88061
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #87734
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 7.0.10
  • JIT: Stop setting class handles for promoted parameter SIMD fields #87967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Shorter jiterp encoding for zero v128 constants; exploit natural stack alignment #88058
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fall back to the forwarder generator for invalid [In, Out] attributes instead of using the already-selected generator with additional diagnostics #88055
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [nativeaot] Build host bits when targeting iOS platforms with Native AOT #87985
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Remove iossimulator runtime-staging pipeline #88036
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Introduce DOTNET_JITAllowOptionalRelocs #88008
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable scoped parameters in signatures of source-generated interop methods #87987
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Add SelfContained property to the iOS sample app #88042
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Remove optimizeForReading overloads from FrozenDictionary/Set #87988
    area-System.Collections, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Document new STJ diagnostics and fix diagnostic id conflicts. #87980
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add example to doc for UnsafeAccessor #88040
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenericPInvokeCalliHelper arg #87928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [HTTP/3] Fix handling cancelation during QUIC connection establishment #87971
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2208985 #87991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Port FrozenDictionary's length bucket optimizations to FrozenSet #87989
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Fix `--make-repro-path` handling of "ILLinker compatible" parameters #87909
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • minor regex cleanup #88026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion #87917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Allow unnecessary [In, Out] attributes on blittable arrays and report them as unnecessary #87774
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Track last index in parameter marshalling #87846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Introduce <InvariantTimezone> build flag #87284
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Fix TimeProvider Timer with Infinity Timeout #88024
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement casing functions #87919
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ZipArchive now disposes given stream only once #87982
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Support filtering property names on dictionary deserialization #87868
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [WIP] System.Linq.Expressions.Interpreter.CallInstruction.CanCreateArbitraryDelegates should respect IsDynamicCodeSupported #86758
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix crash happening due to invalid pointer to free() #86868
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize aggregate info iteration in physical promotion #87997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema and output layout #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` locales covering `LocaleStringData`. #87972
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] ILStrip sorts custom attribute table #87933
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • Missing symbol crash fix #86864
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Add hosting test to validate behavior of runtime property set twice #87781
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug changes #87979
    area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Call runtime imports implemented by runtime exports directly #2321
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use specialized allocators for WASM #2320

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: switch WASI target to wasm32-wasi #2317
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Eliminate gratituous allocations from the LLVM object writer #2319
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to june 23 #2318

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't install tool with version containing a capital letter on Linux #33580
  • NETSDK1206 should not be flagging 'browser' RID platform #33579
    .NET 8.0
  • "dotnet run" not correctly handling Chinese characters input via Console.ReadLine() in Debug mode #33575
  • Build fails on Windows when using .net Core SDK 6.0.411 (6.0.18) but is OK with 6.0.408 (6.0.16) #33570

Closed

  • dotnet tools occasionally hang #30455
    Discussion
  • Cannot start clean .Net Maui project in Visual Studio for Mac #30817
  • dotnet tool restore doesn't make command available #30880
    Discussion
  • Trying to build with PublishAot=true on Mac ARM results in restore failure #28475
    8.0.1xx
  • Add support for `--disable-build-servers` to more MSBuild-driven commands #31651
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2209740 #33590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move wait and result calls to the thread pool to avoid deadlocks. #33586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make non-portable RID warning check all available NETCore.App RIDS for the current TFM #33584
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #33572
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2209685 #33564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • don't install older runtimes on arm64 architectures as they aren't supported #33515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--disable-build-servers` to Run and Store CLI commands #33445
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • adjust item templates to langVersion changes in Roslyn #33576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.2 to 20.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #33574
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.2 to 20.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #33573
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • Support for DisableDiagnosticTracing to suppress TRACE #22883
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenerateRuntimeConfig now uses stream serialization instead of loading file in memory #22576
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rocky Linux support #21029
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] containers: split `Registry.cs` and made it testable #33536
    Area-Containers
  • [main] fix typo #33508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle Uri-less Realms during basic auth, and fix auth lookups for hosts with ports specified #32371
    Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Create CL-2023-06-16.md #7295

Updated

  • Add details to lookup rules for for extensions #7179

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Completion for global using static attempts to insert a regular using #68791
  • Fix LSP RequestMetrics based telemetry reporting #68790
    17.7 P4
  • Missing import discovery crash #68789
  • Implement nullable analysis for collection literals #68786
    C# 12.0
  • Implement optimizations for constructing collections from collection literals #68785
    C# 12.0
  • IDE0083 shouldn't be issued in expression trees #68784
  • "foreach (ref read)" causes an assert in assertBindIdentifierTargets for the "read" identifier #68782
    17.7
  • C# editor: A method can not be collapsed #68778
  • When renaming a GeneratedRegex method, keystrokes are duplicated, and pressing backspace commits the renaming instead of backspacing #68777
    17.8 P1
  • RegisterCodeFixesAsync never hits in custom CodeFixProvider #68776
  • false-positive CS8631 and CS8634 #68773
    C# 12.0
  • Roslyn emits invalid IL with enums that aren't expressible in C# #68770
    Compiler.Next

Closed

  • Code Style IDE0007 and IDE0008 ('var' preferences) should default to preferring var over explicit type for .Net Core 3.1 and .Net 5.0 #57359
    17.6 P2
  • Question: Source generator that uses JSON source generator? #68779
  • React to attribute centralization #68697
    C# 12.0
  • Use of proprietary license in CommonLanguageServerProtocol #68781
  • ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler is failing to load in VS #68730
    17.7
  • Assert when using `__arglist` and `in` arguments together #68714

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve parser error recovery for certain collection-literal cases #68788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove lowering to strict in #68780
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.6] Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #68772
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Test GetTypeInfo on values given to missing attribute #68427
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • EnC: Implement support for editing types with primary constructors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Fix parsing certain postfix expressions with top level collection literals #68787
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection literals: remove DictionaryElementSyntax #68752
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge 'InlineArrays' feature into 'main' #68783
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Add razor compiler EA project ref #68732
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Stop reporting CS7101 on runtime that supports generic updates #68601
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Fix assert when using `__arglist` and `in` arguments together #68726
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Readonly References, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Doc how to test in VSCode #68733
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Improve sequence point placement in primary constructors and records #68765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Fixes SyntaxFactory.UsingDirective overload which always throws - #68761 #68762
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Retain semicolon during updates of IndexerDeclaration #68768
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix SuppressMessage attributes working on primary constructors #68706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Relax value checks for `ref readonly` parameters #68656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • "Fix" LSP semantic token modifiers #68744
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with Parameter Transformers in combination with Area Routing in ASP.NET Core MVC #49041
  • .IsInRole() exception - Active Directory user principal role checking broken during trusted domain interruptions #49039
  • Perf regression: plaintext #49037
  • CI failure with package restore #49035
  • [Blazor] Provide a way to customize the modelbinding errors. #49030
    Backlog
  • Handling of `Disposable` arguments and responses in controller actions #49023

Closed

  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23316.32] Blazor component property doesn't recognize [Parameter] attribute when setting [SupplyParameterFromQuery] attribute together #48937
    8.0-preview6
  • Perf regression: https #48960
  • Perf regression: mapaction #49020
  • Expose SNI hostname via a feature #34525
    8.0-preview6
  • IExceptionHandler is missing XML docs #48640
    8.0-preview7
  • RenderModeServer doesn't work when applied to root component #48793
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor SSR progressive enhancement integration with form posts #48762
    8.0-preview6
  • Replace BearerTokenOptions.ExtractBearerToken with Event #47937
    8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Template cleanup work #48341
    8.0-preview6
  • Failed to execute 'insertBefore' on 'Node': Nodes of type '#text' may not be inserted inside nodes of type '#document' #48574
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor puts <!--!--> all over the place #48834
  • Deadlock in integration tests after upgrading to ASP.NET Core 6 #38649
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Update IExceptionHandler.cs #49040
    area-middleware
  • Update SDK #49034
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #49022
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/8.0-preview6] [Blazor] Allow properties marked with both `[Parameter]` and `[SupplyParameterFromQuery]` to receive values directly #49038
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Allow properties marked with both `[Parameter]` and `[SupplyParameterFromQuery]` to receive values directly #48954
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [release/8.0-preview6] [Blazor] Form mapping error handling and validation integration for SSR Blazor #49031
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Implement ITlsHandshakeFeature in IIS #48957
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Form mapping error handling and validation integration for SSR Blazor #48990
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [skip-ci] Add missing xml docs for ExceptionHandler #48814
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 8.0-preview7
  • Update minimal APIs form binding integration #48999
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Quarantine UnauthorizedDirectWebSocketsConnectionDoesNotConnect #48981
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • Update ProjectTemplates to Id Web 2.12.2 + MS Graph v5 support #48863
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2209591 #48970
    area-mvc
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, .NET 8.0
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Clean up naming and layout for the new Blazor weather page #48940
    area-mvc
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Remove IIS settings from Core API template. #48821
    area-mvc
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d60cf22` to `b239fb5` #48987
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Update docs: Linux dump analysis in a Windows environment #4002
    8.0.0
  • Q: How to use / install dotnet-dump where the dotnet runtime is not installed globally #4006
    8.0.0
  • Single File module scan takes a very long time (symbol lookup) #3737
    8.0.0
  • list-processes command shows processes from other users #314
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Enrich the !u -il command with location information. #502
    Future
  • dotnet-dump threadpool and threadpoolqueue clarification #4003
    8.0.0
  • Q: what does it mean when `verifyheap` reports heap errors? #3974

PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidCastException upon "MyType[] myArr = DbSet<MyType>.ToArray();" #31143
  • Improve RuntimeModel building performance #31142
  • SqliteException - SQLite Error 1: 'not an error'. #31139
  • Relational method for checking whether a path in a JSON exists #31136

Closed

  • EFCore 7.0.8? #31122
  • Json serializer options for json columns #31113
  • Is it possible to map with fluent API a value object to separate table in the database? #31093
  • change model after initialization #31056
  • Enable overrides for scripted schema generation #31026
  • Query root of type 'FromSqlQueryRootExpression' wasn't handled by provider code. This issue happens when using a provider specific method on a different provider where it is not supported. #31023
  • Saving an object with a large number of related children works in EF Core 6 but not in EF Core 7 #30959
  • Upgrade .NET 6 to .NET 7 query throws SqlException (0x80131904): The correlation name 'c0' is specified multiple times in a FROM clause. #30896
  • EF 3.1 to EF 7 object creation changed behavior? #31111

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert binary breaking change in Load/LoadAsync methods #31141

Merged

  • Update SDK #31140
  • Perform alias uniquification in ExecuteUpdate setters #31133
  • Update SDK #31106

Updated

  • Add complex types to Metadata #31003
  • Documentation: Use `using` declarations in README files #31089
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Fix handling of queries with RETURNING clause #31013
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.20
